# Test Generator Skill

## Purpose
Generates comprehensive test cases and test code for various testing scenarios including unit, integration, and end-to-end tests.

## Capabilities
- Generate unit tests for functions and classes
- Create integration test scenarios
- Generate end-to-end test cases
- Produce test data and fixtures
- Create mock objects and stubs
- Generate edge case and boundary tests
- Support multiple testing frameworks (Jest, Pytest, JUnit, etc.)

## Usage
Invoke this skill when you need to:
- Create tests for existing code
- Generate test cases for new features
- Improve test coverage
- Create test data and fixtures
- Generate comprehensive test suites
